query.statement: SELECT A.CODE_GROP -- 코드그룹 ,A.CODE -- 코드 ,A.CODE||':'||A.CODE_NAME AS CODE_NAME -- 코드명 ,A.CDGR_UPER -- 상위코드그룹 ,A.CODE_UPER -- 상위코드 ,A.EXTN_CODE1 -- 추가코드1 ,A.EXTN_CODE2 -- 추가코드2 ,A.EXTN_CODE3 -- 추가코드3 ,A.EXTN_CODE4 -- 추가코드4 ,A.EXTN_CODE5 -- 추가코드5 ,CAST(#ODER# AS VARCHAR(200)) AS DATASET_ID FROM SAPHEE.ZFST0100 A WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.CODE_GROP = 'S15' AND A.CODE != '000' AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY A.CODE_SEQN FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
